events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position, including their resume and cover letter highlighting relevant experience.
The application was reviewed and categorized under the engineering cluster due to the candidate's background in software development and devops skills.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage the recruitment process for this candidate.
The recruiter conducted the initial screening call to assess the candidate’s technical skills and cultural fit for the engineering team.
The candidate responded promptly confirming availability for the scheduled technical interview and expressed enthusiasm about the role.
The technical interview has been scheduled with the candidate for the upcoming Friday at 10 AM UTC to evaluate software engineering expertise.
The technical interview was completed successfully, with positive feedback from the panel regarding the candidate’s coding and problem-solving abilities.
The HR interview has been scheduled for the candidate to discuss company culture, benefits, and other administrative details.
The HR interview concluded positively, with the candidate expressing alignment with company values and interest in the team environment.
An employment offer was formally proposed to the candidate including details on salary, benefits, and start date.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and requested some clarifications about the remote work policy.
The candidate accepted the offer officially and confirmed their excitement to join the engineering team starting next month.
The candidate has started the onboarding process, completing initial paperwork and attending orientation sessions.
The hiring process is officially closed with the candidate fully integrated into the engineering team and currently working on their first project.
